text.title: City Pop ‚Äì Zuhause f√ºhlen in Bern ‚Äì ab 350 CHF/Woche
text.description:

  • Erstellen Sie ein Konto

  • Navigieren Sie zum Suchbereich

  • W√§hlen Sie "Suchen und Jetzt Buchen!"

  • W√§hlen Sie Bern als Ihre Stadt

  • Setzen Sie Ihre gew√ºnschten Check-in- und Check-out-Daten

Was ist in Ihrer Buchung enthalten?

Die Apartments sind vollst√§ndig ausgestattet, darunter:

  • K√ºche, Wohnzimmer, Schlafzimmer, Bad

  • Komplettes K√ºcheninventar (Teller, Gl√§ser, T√∂pfe usw.)

  • Handt√ºcher & Bettw√§sche

  • Nebenkosten inklusive

  • Wi-Fi & Smart TV

Mindestaufenthalt: 4 Wochen

H√∂chstaufenthalt: 52 Wochen. Nach einem Jahr kann ein neues Apartment gebucht werden.

Zusatzservices √ºber die App buchbar:

  • Reinigungsservice (w√∂chentlich oder zweiw√∂chentlich)

ENG

Now available! Starting now, we offer centrally located apartments in Bern, Belpstrasse 23, ranging from 24 to 40 square meters. Starting at 385 CHF/week, you can choose from various Pop types: S Compact, S, M, L, L Deluxe, XL, Duplex and 2.5. .

How to book your apartment:

Just download our app:

  • For iOS: Search City Pop in the App Store

  • For Android: Search City Pop in the Google Play Store

Once installed:

  • Create an account

  • Go to the search section

  • Select "Search and Book Now!"

  • Choose Bern as your city

  • Set your desired check-in and check-out dates

What‚Äôs included in your stay?

Each apartment is fully equipped, including:

  • Kitchen, living room, bedroom, bathroom

  • Full kitchen inventory (plates, glasses, pots, etc.)

  • Towels and bed linen

  • Utilities included

  • Wi-Fi and Smart TV

Minimum stay: 4 weeks

Maximum stay: 52 weeks. After one year, guests are welcome to book a new apartment.

Additional services available via the app:

  • Cleaning service (weekly or biweekly)

  • Parking

  • Storage Room

The building will also feature fantastic communal spaces:

  • Co-living area

  • Co-Working

  • Cinema

  • Fitness

Each guest can personalize their service package to best fit their lifestyle.

As easy as booking a hotel room! Reservations are now open ‚Äì what are you waiting for?

üì≤ Download the City Pop App and book your stay in Bern today! üìß Questions? Write us at contact.ch@citypop.com

attachments.alt: Modern kitchen with gray cabinets, wooden shelves, and built-in appliances including a dishwasher. Open concept living space with dining area and hardwood floors.

The image shows a modern and stylish open-plan living and dining area. The space features a gray sofa, a dining table with place settings, and a kitchen area with a dishwasher visible. The walls are a mix of white and wood paneling, creating a warm and in
Modern kitchen with gray cabinets, wooden countertop, built-in Siemens microwave oven, various kitchen appliances and utensils, and open shelving with decorative items

Modern kitchen with gray cabinets, built-in appliances including a dishwasher, open shelving, and a marble-like countertop. The kitchen has a clean, minimalist design with a mix of wood and gray tones.
Modern bathroom with marble-like tile walls, a glass shower enclosure, a white vanity with a sink, and wooden storage cabinets. There are towels and a potted plant visible as well.
Spacious bedroom with a built-in wooden wardrobe, a large bed with gray bedding, and a decorative lamp on the nightstand. The room has a minimalist and modern design with a cozy atmosphere.
Gray sofa with patterned throw pillows, wooden shelving unit, coffee table, potted plant, and large window with curtains
Modern kitchen with dark gray cabinets, wooden shelves, and a dishwasher. The kitchen opens up to a living area with a TV stand and a dining table with chairs.

This image shows a modern and well-equipped gym space. The room features various fitness equipment such as treadmills, exercise bikes, and weight training machines. The walls are decorated with a green plant wall and a neon sign that says 'Rock your body'
Spacious living room with large sectional sofa, hanging chair, bookshelves, and a large mural wall. The room has track lighting, skylights, and a fireplace.
Spacious living room with large windows, hanging chairs, gray and pink armchairs, wooden shelves, and a large mural wall with illustrations of the city of Bern and surrounding areas.
Modern kitchen with wooden tables and benches, black pendant lights, and a wall mural that says 'In this kitchen we share cultures'
Dark room with comfortable gray sofas, large projection screen, and recessed lighting for a home theater setup

text.title: Cozy Old Building Apartment
text.description:
If you place a high value on living in a central location, you're in the right place here and will find your feel-good oasis. The apartment has the following features:

- modern kitchen with ceramic glass, dishwasher, and large refrigerator
- modern bathroom with plenty of storage space
- all rooms with parquet flooring
- small bay window in the living room
- wall cabinets
- balcony with evening sun
- basement and attic compartment

The Schlossmatte tram stop can be reached within a 1-minute walk.
Shopping facilities and a post office are located in the immediate vicinity.

The images are sample images.

Have we piqued your interest? Then we look forward to your application.

attachments.alt: Modern kitchen with gray cabinets, wooden countertop, built-in Siemens microwave oven, various kitchen appliances and utensils, open shelving with decorative items
Modern kitchen with gray cabinets, wooden shelves, built-in appliances, and a dining area with a table and chairs

The image shows a modern and stylish open-plan living and dining area. The space features a gray sofa, a dining table with place settings, and a kitchen area with a dishwasher visible. The walls are painted in light colors, and the room has a mix of woode

Modern kitchen with gray cabinets, built-in appliances including a dishwasher, open shelving, and a marble-like countertop. The kitchen has a clean, minimalist design with a mix of wood and gray tones.
Modern bathroom with marble-like tile walls, glass shower enclosure, vanity with white sink and wooden cabinets, towels, and a potted plant
Spacious bedroom with a built-in wooden wardrobe, a large bed with gray bedding, and a decorative lamp on the side table. The room has a minimalist and modern design with a cozy atmosphere.

Cozy living room with a gray sofa, decorative pillows, and a throw blanket. There is a wooden shelf unit with decor items, and a small side table with a plant. The room has large windows that provide natural light.
Modern kitchen with dark cabinets, wooden accents, built-in dishwasher, and open view to the living area
Modern and open kitchen space with wooden tables and benches, black pendant lights, and a large wall text that says 'In this kitchen we share cultures'.
Dark, theater-style room with gray upholstered seating, wood flooring, and a projector screen or display at the front
Dark room with a large projection screen, comfortable gray sofas and chairs, and recessed lighting providing a cozy and immersive home cinema experience.
Spacious living room with large sectional sofa, hanging chair, bookshelves, and decorative wall mural. The room has track lighting, skylights, and a fireplace.
5-story office building with a modern facade, located on a street with trees and other residential buildings. The building has the CityCoop logo displayed on the ground floor.
